title: Decision of the Management Board of Europol of 11 July 2002 agreeing to the conditions and procedures laid down by Europol adapting the amounts mentioned in the Appendix to the Decision of the Europol Management Board of 16 November 1999 regarding taxes applicable to salaries and emoluments paid to Europol staff members for the benefit of Europol
header:
Decision of the Management Board of Europol
of 11 July 2002
agreeing to the conditions and procedures laid down by Europol adapting the amounts mentioned in the Appendix to the Decision of the Europol Management Board of 16 November 1999 regarding taxes applicable to salaries and emoluments paid to Europol staff members for the benefit of Europol
(2002/C 218/01)
THE MANAGEMENT BOARD OF EUROPOL
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Protocol drawn up on the basis of Article K.3 of the Treaty on European Union and Article 41(3) of the Europol Convention, on the privileges and immunities of Europol, the members of its organs, the deputy directors and employees of Europol(1), and in particular Article 10 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The Council decided on 13 June 2002 to adapt the salaries and emoluments for Europol officials with 5,2 % with retroactive effect as of 1 July 2001.
(2) The Management Board decided through a written procedure on 11 July 2002 to effect an increase in the amounts mentioned in Article 4 of the Appendix to the Decision of the Management Board of 16 November 1999(2) by the same percentage and as of the same date as determined by the Council Decision of 13 June 2002 mentioned under point 1.
(3) In accordance with the same decision of the Management Board of 11 July 2002 the values thus established should be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities,
main_body:
With effect from 1 July 2001:
1. The value mentioned in the first sentence of Article 4 of the Appendix to the Decision of the Europol Management Board of 16 November 1999 shall be replaced by EUR 101,29.
2. The values in euro units of the table included in Article 4 of the Appendix to the Decision of the Europol Management Board of 16 November 1999 shall be replaced by the following:
8 % to amounts between EUR 101,30 and EUR 1784,32,
10 % to amounts between EUR 1784,33 and EUR 2457,64,
12,5 % to amounts between EUR 2457,65 and EUR 2816,59,
15 % to amounts between EUR 2816,60 and EUR 3198,67,
17,5 % to amounts between EUR 3198,68 and EUR 3557,63,
20 % to amounts between EUR 3557,64 and EUR 3905,57,
22,5 % to amounts between EUR 3905,58 and EUR 4264,52,
25 % to amounts between EUR 4264,53 and EUR 4612,47,
27,5 % to amounts between EUR 4612,48 and EUR 4971,43,
30 % to amounts between EUR 4971,44 and EUR 5319,38,
32,5 % to amounts between EUR 5319,39 and EUR 5678,33,
35 % to amounts between EUR 5678,34 and EUR 6026,82,
40 % to amounts between EUR 6026,83 and EUR 6385,79,
45 % to amounts above EUR 6385,80.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Decision shall enter into force the day following that of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at The Hague, 11 July 2002.
J. Scharf
Chairman of the Management Board
(1) OJ C 221, 19.7.1997, p. 2.
(2) OJ C 65, 28.2.2001, p. 8.
